div.p:
Letters -
Works every room and individual see after Customers want or Complaint also the same in Sales Shop I have erred in leaving the Front Room, I should have been at Call more and made more of Customers by always being in and not running off to dinner at any rate
untill until
I had had someone to fill my place well

list.item: Examine work before send home Charge

div.note: Never were such books! No, nov never will be such books as the books of Cheeryble Brothers Vide Nicholas Nickleby p35b
